paper.title: Dynamic k-Dimensional Multiway Search under Time-Varying Access Frequencies
paper.abstract: We consider multiway search trees for k-dimensional search under time-varying access frequencies. Let S = {kl,...,kn} be a set of k-dimensional keys, k≥1, and let p i t be the number of accesses to ki, also called frequency of ki, up to time t, \(W^t = \sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {p_i^t }\).
